locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Clean restrooms and showers. There was a 60 minute wait for a shower at 1:00 pm and the wait was longer after I was finished. Burger King and Subway were clean and busy. Truck parking was full by 3:30 pm. 2 or more trucks deep at each pump all day. This is a busy place. Need more truck parking but what Loves doesn't.

It‚Äôs in good condition and has a good size parking lot
However at 10am they had two fuel lines blocked for cleaning!! And 10 trucks in line waiting to fuel up plus the ones that just stop and take their 30 just in the fuel lines üòí I think they can find less busy times for these cleaning procedures ‚Ä¶

Excellent excellent location! Expansive parking lot with only a couple few spots that are hard to get into. Vibrant and chatty and Interactive staff. Very clean throughout. Extraordinarily busy at all hours of the day and night! The gal at ‚Ä¶
Easy access. Very clean. Friendly employees. Well stocked. Wide fuel area. Burger King and Subway on location (didn‚Äôt visit those).
I absolutely love Love's. When I'm traveling I only stop at Love's for snacks and to use the restroom because its always clean and have what I'm looking for every trip.

showerReviews.reviewText: Normally  just stop for fuel and Wendy's  but got a shower  this time.  Not Good! The AC was not working  and the shower  was not very  clean.
Under construction right now. Shower was nice tho

Clean hot showers with hot water and good pressure the Wendy‚Äôs even got the order right , can‚Äôt speak for the fuel pump situation as it was just a in and out affair for quick shower and break but nice sized parking lot and wasn‚Äôt littered ‚Ä¶

This Pilot was great. Used the shower facility, and it was immaculate. Appeared to be recently renovated, or just well kept up. The custodian asked me on the way out if I enjoyed the shower, and I said definitely. He was very nice and does ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and a dq. The bathrooms were really clean and they had a built In baby changer, but wasn't big enough for my two year old. Lots of snack options and drinks as well as a shower location for truckers or long travels. Very friendly staff.
Clean shower, nice easy to get into spots. Unfortunately a lot of spots are at a slant, But not a big deal. Good food options on this pilot. Spent 34 hours here with no complaints.

‚Ä¶ dump. Filthy dirty, trash everywhere. Forget getting a shower here, especially if you're a big guy. The shower stalls are like out of the '70s and built for a fifth grader, plus they haven't had a thorough cleaning in years. Wendy's was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I decided to pull into the truck stop because I slept in the car the night before and I was going to see about getting a shower I've heard they have showers at truck stops so I pulled in and I went into the store I met Lee went to the I saw ‚Ä¶
Great place. The staff is very friendly and the showers are always clean. I come here on a regular basis to fuel up and shower and I‚Äôve always felt satisfied with the service.
No laundry. Waoting for shower for a while. Shame for truck stop. Careless creatures.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ , controlled access using your phone, PAVEMENT (no dirt or gravel here), an onsite his and her bathroom and shower facility (that is cleaned and sanitized daily), ample lighting/camera surveillance and I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôm missing some pros with ‚Ä¶

Had a good parking experience at this new and convenient location. This is a safe and reliable place to park your semi truck with bathrooms and a shower. I would recommend this to any trucker that we all know struggle with finding parking ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ This is a fenced location with security cameras, very easy parking with lots of room to maneuver. Bathrooms and shower are available and were both very clean. ‚Ä¶
This place is Great and safe. Big parking lot with shower and restroom and Secure and gated  I recommend  and not far from I 75 quite to.   Thanks.
Quiet, clean with restrooms and portable shower trailers. The owner is super helpful if you need anything and truly cares about the customers.
Nice and quiet for $10 and a free shower for your stay
Great place to park for the money ,shower ,restroom can't beat it .thanks for doing this for us.
It‚Äôs really good price parking bathroom and (shower for free )
Clean shower and bath rooms! Nice and quiet!

food was amazing(new owner at cafe)...shower pressure not too good but over all I'll definitely be back...friendly staff in store and restaurant
They got a very nasty shower and they are very very bad

25 dollars 2 park and 15 dollars for a shower just highway robbery stay away from this place but the waffle house next door has great food

Very new place showers are clean yard is wide enough for backing. Worker was pleasant smiles alot. If purchase fuel here shower is free. I didn't fuel so parking $12 and shower $12.

24 years driving and for the first time you gonna tell me I can use the same shower with my Wife
Absolutely out of your mind

Clean, friendly faces, small environment with options to eat around it. $12 for parking, $12 for a shower but a lot better better than the mega stops, definitely will come back when through here.
